channel.title: Is it worth it?
channel.description: Skyrim. I loved oblivion. And people say skyrim is alot different then oblivion. Im going to game-stop tonight for a new game. Is it worth the 60$? Or not.

item.title: Is it worth it?
item.dc:creator: @Dunder_Mifflin1 Dunder Mifflin
item.description:
@Dunder_Mifflin1 wrote:

Seriously, you couldn’t just google this or ask your FRIENDS about it? Come on man, why the fuck would you want strangers over the internet to manage your life…

I dont see why you need to get all angry about this. Yes I did buy it. But I was asking compared to all the other games I could buy out there. Such as saint row 3, gears of war 3, MW3. I just wanted different views. Don’t get pissy about it. I also asked some of my friends, so why would asking for more feedback about the game be so bad? Don’t like the topic, you dont have to read it. It doesn’t effect you in any way shape or form. I dont mean to beat a dead horse, just curious is all.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it worth it?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

I’m not saying that companies should provide the source, I’m only saying that laws about data should be clearer (someone correct me if they’re not clear enough)

item.title: Is it worth it?
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9`, post:25, topic:422226”]The nigger thing was a joke, it’s just that I was just reading over CoonHunter’s cracked launcher thread and I saw that :p[/quote]Software is something different than physical content. Software can be easily distributed, which is why the source code is not provided with the purchase. When you sell a BMW, people can’t just copy the BMW and resell it under another name. Because it would cost to much. Software be easily sold after being modified because there are almost no production costs for a content thief.

Read full topic

item.title: Is it worth it?
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:23, topic:422226”][quote author=ytuio9` link=topic=524896.msg3822338#msg3822338 date=1321900821]
Something being useless would mean that you got absolutely nothing out of it, the point of video games is entertainment and if you don’t want to pay for it then frankly you don’t deserve it. While I believe in free trials (NiggerCoonHunter anyone) I also believe in paying for something that took time and effort to make no matter how large or minimal that effort is.

I also believe that companies are now turning into greedy fuckers and that there should be better laws concerning data and ownership of it. I heard that when you buy software it isn’t considered yours even though you paid for it. If you were to liken this to real life, and someone were to buy a real life toy, dismantle it, figure out how it works then use that to create other toys, would he be prosecuted for it? inb4 leechers argument: if they just copy the code they won’t understand how it works and will just end up making it bad and function horribly.

Just my say
[/quote]Wiseman.[/quote]

Why did you put

(NiggerCoonHunter anyone)
in there?

Read full topic

If you were to liken this to real life, and someone were to buy a real life toy, dismantle it, figure out how it works then use that to create other toys, would he be prosecuted for it? inb4 leechers argument: if they just copy the code they won’t understand how it works and will just end up making it bad and function horribly.

Just my say[/quote]Wiseman.

item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Something being useless would mean that you got absolutely nothing out of it, the point of video games is entertainment and if you don’t want to pay for it then frankly you don’t deserve it. While I believe in free trials (NiggerCoonHunter anyone) I also believe in paying for something that took time and effort to make no matter how large or minimal that effort is.

I also believe that companies are now turning into greedy fuckers and that there should be better laws concerning data and ownership of it. I heard that when you buy software it isn’t considered yours even though you paid for it. If you were to liken this to real life, and someone were to buy a real life toy, dismantle it, figure out how it works then use that to create other toys, would he be prosecuted for it? inb4 leechers argument: if they just copy the code they won’t understand how it works and will just end up making it bad and function horribly.

Just my say

item.title: Is it worth it?
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:12, topic:422226”][quote author=`Alec link=topic=524896.msg3820840#msg3820840 date=1321753179]

EDIT: I started hating faggots after seeing what Alec wrote.

He’s asking for an opinion, to see what other people’s thoughts are. Not letting strangers control his life. Why the fuck do you bother telling strangers what to do and what not?

I don’t see why he can’t make decisions for himself and is compelled to attention whore himself on these forums… This is obviously a “I’m totally gonna buy this game guys but first you all need to tell me how good it is even though I’ve been told 2000 times before kk thnx” thread.
[/quote]
He obviously wants different views on this game probably for different reasons as some people don’t come in to contact with people often as they may be home schooled or live under different circumstances as you aswell maybe they’d like to become a little bit more active on the forums and start up a little more chatter around here instead of posting pointless replies and making an ass out of there self.

On topic here, I think it’s well worth your money but from what I hear the FPS lowers gradually as memory is taken up on the game.[/quote]
I second that.

Read full topic

EDIT: I started hating faggots after seeing what Alec wrote.

He’s asking for an opinion, to see what other people’s thoughts are. Not letting strangers control his life. Why the fuck do you bother telling strangers what to do and what not?
[/quote]

I don’t see why he can’t make decisions for himself and is compelled to attention whore himself on these forums… This is obviously a “I’m totally gonna buy this game guys but first you all need to tell me how good it is even though I’ve been told 2000 times before kk thnx” thread.[/quote]
He obviously wants different views on this game probably for different reasons as some people don’t come in to contact with people often as they may be home schooled or live under different circumstances as you aswell maybe they’d like to become a little bit more active on the forums and start up a little more chatter around here instead of posting pointless replies and making an ass out of there self.

On topic here, I think it’s well worth your money but from what I hear the FPS lowers gradually as memory is taken up on the game.

item.title: Is it worth it?
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“xryz, post:6, topic:422226”]even though i didnt buy it i would say i would buy it if i had the money too. playing it atm.[/quote]If I had the money, I’d buy everything, except for songs because downloading an MP3 is really fast.
I’d even go to the movies instead of waiting for a DVDrip.

That if I had the money, but I don’t. Having the money for those purposes is the same to me as having too much money and not knowing where to spend it on. Like if I had JB’s 112 million dollars. Then I’d buy my games. I’d watch the movies in a movie theater (it’s not like I don’t ever go to the movies, I go about 2 - 3 times a year because of friends). I’d donate to charitable organizations. Took back what belongs to Armenia (from the Turks). And make more money. Sorry for this information as most of you won’t care but it’s 2AM and I’m bored.

EDIT: I started hating faggots after seeing what Alec wrote.

He’s asking for an opinion, to see what other people’s thoughts are. Not letting strangers control his life. Why the fuck do you bother telling strangers what to do and what not?

Read full topic
